title: Define Variable
text: X should be how many times "uh" is said. Find the time interval associated with it.
speech: X should be how many times "uh" is said. Find the time interval associated with it.

title: Time Interval
text: What would the time interval be?

title: Define Variable
text: Therefore, X should be how many times "uh" is said during one broadcast.
speech: Therefore, X should be how many times "uh" is said during one broadcast.
pacedSpeech: Therefore, X should be how many times "uh" is said during one broadcast.

title: Define Variable Scope
text: uh can only be said a positive number of times or $$0$$ times. "uh" can also only be said a whole number of times, not a decimal number of times.
speech: uh can only be said a positive number of times or  0  times. "uh" can also only be said a whole number of times, not a decimal number of times.

times. "uh" can also only be said a whole number of times, not a decimal number of times.
